mapper.select: <<<<<<< HEAD select Addr, Unique_id, Content, Keep_place, Image_address, Product_name, Find_date, Category, lon, lat from lost limit 0, 10
select Addr, Unique_id, Content, Keep_place, Image_address, Product_name, DATE_FORMAT(Find_date,'%Y-%m-%d') Find_date, Category, lon, lat from lost where Unique_id = #{Unique_id}

select Addr, Unique_id, Content, Keep_place, Image_address, Product_name, DATE_FORMAT(Find_date,'%Y-%m-%d') Find_date, Category, lon, lat from lost where Product_name like concat('%',#{key},'%') ======= select Addr, Unique_id, Content, Keep_place, Image_address, Product_name, Find_date, Category, lon, lat from lost
select Addr, Unique_id, Content, Keep_place, Image_address, Product_name, DATE_FORMAT(Find_date,'%Y-%m-%d'), Category, lon, lat from lost where Unique_id = #{Unique_id}
